name: Github Trigger
semantic_context: Starts the workflow when Github events occur
natural_language_description: 这是 Github Trigger 节点。主要用于: Starts the workflow when Github events occur

notice.displayName: Only members with owner privileges for an organization or admin privileges for a repository can set up the webhooks this node requires.
notice.name: notice
notice.natural_language_description: 参数名: Only members with owner privileges for an organization or admin privileges for a repository can set up the webhooks this node requires.

authentication.name: authentication
authentication.natural_language_description: 参数名: Authentication | 默认值: accessToken
available_options: Access Token (值: accessToken)
OAuth2 (值: oAuth2)

owner.name: owner
owner.natural_language_description: 参数名: Repository Owner | 默认值: {'mode': 'list', 'value': ''} | (必填项)

repository.name: repository
repository.natural_language_description: 参数名: Repository Name | 默认值: {'mode': 'list', 'value': ''} | (必填项)

events.name: events
events.natural_language_description: 参数名: Events | 作用: The events to listen to | 默认值: [] | (必填项)
available_options: * (值: *) - Any time any event is triggered (Wildcard Event)
Check Run (值: check_run) - Triggered when a check run is created, rerequested, completed, or has a requested_action
Check Suite (值: check_suite) - Triggered when a check suite is completed, requested, or rerequested
Commit Comment (值: commit_comment) - Triggered when a commit comment is created
Create (值: create) - Represents a created repository, branch, or tag
Delete (值: delete) - Represents a deleted branch or tag
Deploy Key (值: deploy_key) - Triggered when a deploy key is added or removed from a repository
Deployment (值: deployment) - Represents a deployment
Deployment Status (值: deployment_status) - Represents a deployment status
Fork (值: fork) - Triggered when a user forks a repository
Github App Authorization (值: github_app_authorization) - Triggered when someone revokes their authorization of a GitHub App
Gollum (值: gollum) - Triggered when a Wiki page is created or updated

Installation (值: installation) - Triggered when someone installs (created), uninstalls (deleted), or accepts new permissions (new_permissions_accepted) for a GitHub App. When a GitHub App owner requests new permissions, the person who installed the GitHub App must accept the new permissions request.
Installation Repositories (值: installation_repositories) - Triggered when a repository is added or removed from an installation
Issue Comment (值: issue_comment) - Triggered when an issue comment is created, edited, or deleted

Issues (值: issues) - Triggered when an issue is opened, edited, deleted, transferred, pinned, unpinned, closed, reopened, assigned, unassigned, labeled, unlabeled, locked, unlocked, milestoned, or demilestoned
Label (值: label) - Triggered when a repository's label is created, edited, or deleted

Marketplace Purchase (值: marketplace_purchase) - Triggered when someone purchases a GitHub Marketplace plan, cancels their plan, upgrades their plan (effective immediately), downgrades a plan that remains pending until the end of the billing cycle, or cancels a pending plan change
Member (值: member) - Triggered when a user accepts an invitation or is removed as a collaborator to a repository, or has their permissions changed
Membership (值: membership) - Triggered when a user is added or removed from a team. Organization hooks only.
Meta (值: meta) - Triggered when the webhook that this event is configured on is deleted
Milestone (值: milestone) - Triggered when a milestone is created, closed, opened, edited, or deleted
Org Block (值: org_block) - Triggered when an organization blocks or unblocks a user. Organization hooks only.
Organization (值: organization) - Triggered when an organization is deleted and renamed, and when a user is added, removed, or invited to an organization. Organization hooks only.
Page Build (值: page_build) - Triggered on push to a GitHub Pages enabled branch (gh-pages for project pages, master for user and organization pages)
Project (值: project) - Triggered when a project is created, updated, closed, reopened, or deleted
Project Card (值: project_card) - Triggered when a project card is created, edited, moved, converted to an issue, or deleted
Project Column (值: project_column) - Triggered when a project column is created, updated, moved, or deleted
Public (值: public) - Triggered when a private repository is open sourced

Pull Request (值: pull_request) - Triggered when a pull request is assigned, unassigned, labeled, unlabeled, opened, edited, closed, reopened, synchronize, ready_for_review, locked, unlocked, a pull request review is requested, or a review request is removed
Pull Request Review (值: pull_request_review) - Triggered when a pull request review is submitted into a non-pending state, the body is edited, or the review is dismissed
Pull Request Review Comment (值: pull_request_review_comment) - Triggered when a comment on a pull request's unified diff is created, edited, or deleted (in the Files Changed tab)
Push (值: push) - Triggered on a push to a repository branch. Branch pushes and repository tag pushes also trigger webhook push events. This is the default event.
Release (值: release) - Triggered when a release is published, unpublished, created, edited, deleted, or prereleased

Repository (值: repository) - Triggered when a repository is created, archived, unarchived, renamed, edited, transferred, made public, or made private. Organization hooks are also triggered when a repository is deleted.
Repository Import (值: repository_import) - Triggered when a successful, cancelled, or failed repository import finishes for a GitHub organization or a personal repository
Repository Vulnerability Alert (值: repository_vulnerability_alert) - Triggered when a security alert is created, dismissed, or resolved
Security Advisory (值: security_advisory) - Triggered when a new security advisory is published, updated, or withdrawn
Star (值: star) - Triggered when a star is added or removed from a repository
Status (值: status) - Triggered when the status of a Git commit changes
Team (值: team) - Triggered when an organization's team is created, deleted, edited, added_to_repository, or removed_from_repository. Organization hooks only.
Team Add (值: team_add) - Triggered when a repository is added to a team
Watch (值: watch) - Triggered when someone stars a repository

options.name: options
options.natural_language_description: 参数名: Options | 默认值: {}
available_options: insecureSSL (值: None) - Whether the SSL certificate of the n8n host be verified by GitHub when delivering payloads
